turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how may i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to place an order at the Peet's in Palo Alto on 53 Homer Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get the order started for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want to try the Havana cappuccino.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: in small size and with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any syrups in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you have them do just kind of a splash of honey?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can add that to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you'd like a small havana cappuccino with almond milk and splash of honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You did. Instead of a small, can you make it a medium?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yep let me change that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: to confirm, you'd like a medium havana cappuccino with almond milk and splash of honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is your total. would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink will be ready at Peet's in Palo Alto. it should be ready for pick up in 6 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's it. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.
